name: Idle Eleven - Soccer Tycoon
description:
Become the richest soccer manager!

Create your personalized football club, recruit the most valuable players, swipe to earn tons of cash, manage your teams and become the best sport tycoon... EVER!

FEATURES:
▪ CREATE the soccer club of your dream (name, jersey, logo)
▪ RECRUIT top players in the transfer market to build your dream team (attackers, midfields, defenders..)
▪ COLLECT the money generated by these players (casual and easy swipe based gameplay)
▪ RECEIVE idle cash, even when you are offline
▪ TRAIN your players and upgrade their soccer skills (shooting, passing, dribbling, defense…) to multiply their value and the money they generate
▪ PARTICIPATE in business events to earn amazing amounts of cash
▪ PLAY intense “swipe & tap” matches in a Champions League‘s atmosphere
▪ MANAGE the formation of your dream team
▪ SHARE your unique top eleven with your friends and the world!
▪ PLAY ANYWHERE! - Free to play online or offline, no connection required.

If you like idle games, clicker games, tycoon games, tapping games, soccer games or even casino games... you will enjoy this casual management clicker!

Idle Eleven is a unique, free, easy-to-play game different from all the other soccer games, where you can be both a manager and an insanely rich business tycoon. Manage the recruitment and finances of your club (through a super intuitive “swipe and tap” gameplay), deal with your sponsors, find the right business strategy and turn your small team into a giant soccer empire! Time to write your success story!

Become the greatest and richest soccer tycoon of all time!

Believe us, you’ll love to create amazing clubs such as Real Munich, Manchester Kings, Spartak New York, Madrid United, and make them legendary! Available for many smaller countries and cities too :)
